name: The Mountain Explorer
summary: An exhilarating journey through the Himalayas
description: Experience the majesty of the Himalayas with a challenging yet rewarding trek. Uncover the pristine beauty of remote valleys and high-altitude passes.

name: The Desert Wanderer
summary: Mesmerizing camel safari in the Thar Desert
description: Embark on a magical journey through the golden sands of the Thar Desert. Enjoy camel rides, traditional Rajasthani cuisine, and cultural performances under the stars.

name: The Jungle Adventure
summary: Wildlife safari in the Sundarbans
description: Discover the rich biodiversity of the Sundarbans, home to the majestic Royal Bengal Tiger. Explore the mangrove forests and witness a variety of wildlife.

name: The Backwater Cruise
summary: Serene houseboat tour in Kerala
description: Sail through the tranquil backwaters of Kerala on a luxurious houseboat. Enjoy the lush greenery, traditional Kerala cuisine, and picturesque views.

name: The Cultural Odyssey
summary: Exploration of India's cultural heritage in Rajasthan
description: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of Rajasthan. Visit majestic palaces, vibrant bazaars, and experience traditional folk music and dance.

name: The Spiritual Sojourn
summary: Pilgrimage tour in Varanasi
description: Experience the spiritual essence of India in Varanasi, the city of temples and ghats. Participate in Ganga Aarti, visit ancient temples, and soak in the divine atmosphere.

name: The Beach Retreat
summary: Relaxing beach holiday in Goa
description: Unwind on the pristine beaches of Goa. Enjoy water sports, beach parties, and the vibrant nightlife that this coastal paradise has to offer.

name: The Tea Trail
summary: Tea plantation tour in Darjeeling
description: Explore the lush tea gardens of Darjeeling. Learn about the tea-making process, enjoy tea tasting sessions, and witness breathtaking views of the Himalayas.

name: The Temple Trail
summary: Historical temple tour in Tamil Nadu
description: Discover the architectural marvels of Tamil Nadu's ancient temples. Visit iconic sites like Brihadeeswarar Temple, Meenakshi Temple, and more.

name: The River Expedition
summary: Rafting adventure in the Ganges
description: Experience the thrill of white-water rafting in the Ganges River. Navigate through challenging rapids and enjoy the stunning scenery of the river valley.

name: The Fort Explorer
summary: Historical fort tour in Maharashtra
description: Step back in time and explore the grand forts of Maharashtra. Learn about their history, architectural brilliance, and the stories of valor and glory.

name: The Island Hopper
summary: Island hopping in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands
description: Discover the untouched beauty of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. Enjoy snorkeling, scuba diving, and exploring the pristine beaches and lush forests.

name: The Wildlife Wanderer
summary: Wildlife safari in Jim Corbett National Park
description: Explore the wilderness of Jim Corbett National Park. Spot Bengal tigers, elephants, and a variety of other wildlife species in their natural habitat.

name: The Ancient Explorer
summary: Exploration of ancient ruins in Hampi
description: Uncover the history and grandeur of Hampi's ancient ruins. Explore the UNESCO World Heritage sites and marvel at the architectural brilliance of this bygone era.

name: The Cultural Connoisseur
summary: Cultural tour in Kolkata
description: Immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of Kolkata. Visit historical landmarks, art galleries, and experience the vibrant local life.

name: The Hill Station Escape
summary: Relaxing retreat in Shimla
description: Escape to the serene hill station of Shimla. Enjoy the cool climate, scenic views, and colonial charm of this popular summer retreat.

name: The Northern Circuit
summary: Comprehensive tour of North India
description: Experience the best of North India. Visit the Taj Mahal, Jaipur's palaces, Varanasi's ghats, and the Himalayan foothills in one incredible journey.

name: The Coastal Cruiser
summary: Scenic coastal tour of Kerala
description: Travel along the beautiful coastline of Kerala. Explore charming coastal towns, pristine beaches, and enjoy delicious seafood.

name: The Eastern Expedition
summary: Exploration of Northeast India
description: Discover the natural beauty and cultural diversity of Northeast India. Visit Meghalaya's living root bridges, Kaziranga National Park, and more.

name: The Tribal Trail
summary: Cultural tour of tribal villages in Odisha
description: Experience the unique culture of Odisha's tribal communities. Visit traditional villages, interact with locals, and learn about their customs and crafts.

name: The Monsoon Magic
summary: Rainy season adventure in Cherrapunji
description: Witness the magical transformation of Cherrapunji during the monsoon. Enjoy lush green landscapes, roaring waterfalls, and the unique living root bridges.

name: The Urban Explorer
summary: City tour of Mumbai
description: Explore the bustling city of Mumbai. Visit iconic landmarks like the Gateway of India, Marine Drive, and delve into the vibrant local culture and cuisine.

name: The Heritage Walk
summary: Walking tour of Old Delhi
description: Discover the rich history of Old Delhi on a guided walking tour. Visit historic sites, bustling markets, and enjoy local street food.

name: The Royal Retreat
summary: Luxury tour of Udaipur
description: Experience the regal charm of Udaipur, the City of Lakes. Stay in luxury heritage hotels, enjoy boat rides, and explore the majestic City Palace.

name: The Foodie Trail
summary: Culinary tour of Hyderabad
description: Indulge in the culinary delights of Hyderabad. Taste iconic dishes like Biryani, Haleem, and explore the city's rich gastronomic heritage.

name: The Forest Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
